name: Strategy Development
description: Understanding where the organization is going and why.

name: Goal & OKR Alignment
description: Connecting strategy to clear goals, outcomes, and success measures.

name: Prioritization & Trade-off Making
description: Deciding what matters most and what to pause or stop.

name: Roadmapping & Planning
description: Laying out what's coming next and how work will sequence over time.

name: Strategic Portfolio Management
description: Choosing and balancing major bets, initiatives, and investments.

name: Resource & Capacity Planning
description: Allocating people, teams, and budget to the work.

name: Scenario & What-If Modeling
description: Exploring options and tradeoffs before committing.

name: Planning Cycle Support
description: Coordinating annual, quarterly, and continuous planning rhythms.

name: Budgeting & Financial Stewardship
description: Managing costs and aligning investment with value.

name: Capitalization
description: Determining which work can be capitalized and ensuring correct accounting treatment.

name: P&L Calculation & Rollups
description: Understanding revenue, cost, and profit impacts at team, product, or portfolio levels.

name: Financial Reporting
description: Providing clear financial visibility to leaders and teams.

name: ROI Calculation & Investment Evaluation
description: Assessing expected returns and comparing investment options.

name: Outcome Tracking & Impact Measurement
description: Measuring whether the work made the desired difference.

name: Customer & Market Insight
description: Collecting and synthesizing customer signals and market understanding.

name: Product Discovery
description: Learning what customers need and validating assumptions.

name: Experimentation & Validation
description: Testing ideas and reducing uncertainty before scaling.

name: Cross-Functional Collaboration
description: Helping teams align and work together across functions.

name: Execution Coordination
description: Managing dependencies, milestones, reviews, and ongoing delivery flow.

name: Change Management
description: Helping the organization adopt new practices, tools, and direction shifts.

name: Team Health & Effectiveness
description: Keeping teams aligned, sustainable, and functioning well.

name: Technical Excellence & Quality
description: Improving engineering practices, velocity, and code quality.

name: Risk Management
description: Identifying and addressing risks early.

name: Data-Informed Decision Making
description: Using analytics and evidence to guide choices.

name: Documentation & Knowledge Management
description: Capturing and sharing information so teams can find and use it.

name: Onboarding & Training
description: Supporting new hires and building skills across the org.

name: Tooling & Vendor Management
description: Selecting and managing tools and external providers.

name: Communication & Stakeholder Alignment
description: Ensuring shared context and expectations across leadership and teams.

name: Launch & Commercialization Readiness
description: Preparing for customer rollout, adoption, and internal enablement.

name: Organizational Design
description: Structuring teams, roles, and workflows to support the work.
